seo.title: Tina Cloud
seo.description: Tina Cloud is a content management platform composed of an open-source editing UI and a backend powered by GraphQL and Git.

blocks.headline: Ship Great Content, Faster
blocks.subline: Tina Cloud is a Headless CMS Backed by Git

items.headline: Collaborate as a Team
items.subline: Tina Cloud brings authentication, user management, roles. Onboard your team in no time, no GitHub accounts for editors required.

items.headline: Move Faster With Tina Cloud
items.subline: Visual editing and Git storage allows you to ship content faster with the safety of version-control.

items.headline: Keep your Data in Check
items.subline:
Tina Cloud Content API provides a GraphQL interface to your repositories' files, bringing data integrity and relationships to your content files.
Store your content in open formats like Markdown and JSON to ease content re-use and migrations.

items.headline: Robust Content Models
items.subline: Tina promotes a document-oriented approach to content models. This means repeatable or nested structures like blocks can be stored with the pageâ€™s complete data, resulting in more straightforward content queries and operations.

blocks.headline: *Edit Content, Not Code*
blocks.subline: Make changes in context and see them in real-time. Hit save and let Tina handle the commit for you.
